content: विषयिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Sensual, carnal. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A man of the world, worldling. {@--2@} A king. {@--3@} The god of love. {@--4@} A sensualist, voluptuary; विषयिणः कस्यापदोऽस्तं गताः <ls>Pt. 1. 146</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} An organ of sense. {@--2@} Knowledge (ज्ञान).
